content: Yicheng Chen received the B.Eng. degree in automation science in 2021 from Beihang University, Beijing, China, where he is currently working toward the M.Sc. degree in control science and engineering. His research interests include motion planning, pattern recognition, and reinforcement learning.
summary: Yicheng Chen received the B.Eng. degree in automation science in 2021 from Beihang University, Beijing, China, where he is currently working toward the M.Sc. degree in control science and engineering. His research interests include motion planning, pattern recognition, and reinforcement learning.
title: Yicheng Chen

summary: A novel RRT-based path planning algorithm that enables UAVs to fly safely in three-dimensional environments with dynamic threats
title: Adaptively Dynamic RRT*-Connect: Path Planning for UAVs Against Dynamic Obstacles

summary: We introduce a novel Multi-UAV Mobile Edge Computing Platform, which aims to provide better Quality-of-Service and path planning based on reinforcement learning.
title: Multi-UAV Mobile Edge Computing and Path Planning Platform Based on Reinforcement Learning
